column3: News;Phnom Penh: The------ body of an unidentified man was found floating in the river on October 23
column4: 2018. The corpse washed up at the dock of popular tourist cruise ships ‘Kanika’ and ‘Queen Mary’
column5: close to the Himawari Hotel.------Local authorities and police officers came to check the scene ------and said the man was around 30 years old. It is believed that cause of death was drowning.------The dead body was sent to the Sambom Meas pagoda in Dangkor district
column6: but if no relatives come soon
